verses.text: Thus hath the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* shewed unto me; and, behold, he formed grasshoppers in the beginning of the shooting up of the latter growth ; and, lo, \add it was\add* the latter growth after the king’s mowings.\f + \fr 7.1 \ft grasshoppers: or, green worms\f*

And it came to pass, \add that\add* when they had made an end of eating the grass of the land , then I said , O Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, forgive , I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise ? for he \add is\add* small.\f + \fr 7.2 \ft by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?\f*

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* repented for this: It shall not be, saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. \p

¶ Thus hath the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* shewed unto me: and, behold, the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* called to contend by fire , and it devoured the great deep , and did eat up a part.
Then said I, O Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, cease , I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise ? for he \add is\add* small.\f + \fr 7.5 \ft by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?\f*

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* repented for this: This also shall not be, saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*. \p
¶ Thus he shewed me: and, behold, the Lord stood upon a wall \add made\add* by a plumbline , with a plumbline in his hand.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto me, Amos , what seest thou? And I said , A plumbline. Then said the Lord , Behold, I will set a plumbline in the midst of my people Israel : I will not again pass by them any more:
And the high places of Isaac shall be desolate , and the sanctuaries of Israel shall be laid waste ; and I will rise against the house of Jeroboam with the sword. \p
¶ Then Amaziah the priest of Beth-el sent to Jeroboam king of Israel , saying , Amos hath conspired against thee in the midst of the house of Israel : the land is not able to bear all his words.
For thus Amos saith , Jeroboam shall die by the sword , and Israel shall surely be led away captive out of their own land.
Also Amaziah said unto Amos , O thou seer , go , flee thee away into the land of Judah , and there eat bread , and prophesy there:

But prophesy not again any more at Beth-el : for it \add is\add* the king’s chapel , and it \add is\add* the king’s court.\f + \fr 7.13 \ft chapel: or, sanctuary\f*\f + \fr 7.13 \ft king’s court: Heb. house of the kingdom\f* \p

¶ Then answered Amos , and said to Amaziah , I \add was\add* no prophet , neither \add was\add* I a prophet’s son ; but I \add was\add* an herdman , and a gatherer of sycomore fruit :\f + \fr 7.14 \ft sycomore…: or, wild figs\f*

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* took me as I followed the flock , and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* said unto me, Go , prophesy unto my people Israel.  +  r 7.15  t as…: Heb. from behind * \p
¶ Now therefore hear thou the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: Thou sayest , Prophesy not against Israel , and drop not \add thy word\add* against the house of Isaac.

Therefore thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Thy wife shall be an harlot in the city , and thy sons and thy daughters shall fall by the sword , and thy land shall be divided by line ; and thou shalt die in a polluted land : and Israel shall surely go into captivity forth of his land.
